'''Radiant Spincrystal 3''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Lone Sojourner]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in a wooden cart behind the sign across [[Tunner]] outside of the [[Dawn Winery Manor]].
